alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 8:06PM EDT until August 08 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cattaraugus County in western New York... Southwestern Erie County in western New York... Chautauqua County in western New York... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 806 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Westfield to near Clymer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Springville, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda and Falconer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 59 and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
